message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $110 is a bit out of my price range. I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $85.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $110 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $95. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value you'll get from this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $95 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking to my original offer of $85.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your original offer, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $85. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I can offer you the product for $90. This is a good compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value you'll get from this product.
